locale.metaTitle: Swene - Accept, Buy & Sell Bitcoin, Ethereum, and more
locale.metaDescription: Swene, based in the EU is a secure platform that helps businesses accept and customers buy, sell, and manage cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and more.
locale.headDescription: Buy, sell, trade and manage cryptocurrencies using a safe and secure decentralized portfolio.
locale.headImageAlt: Swene - buy, sell, manage, and accept cryptocurrencies
locale.overviewEmphasis: Swene is a virtual currency solutions provider that will fit all your needs from simple to advanced trading, secure storage, and crypto payment processing.
locale.overviewDescription: Our team of experts have built these solutions to facilitate and ease the purchase, sale, trade, acceptance and management of your virtual currencies. From beginners to experts and from businesses to individuals, our solutions have been designed to improve your ability to trade. Our tailored approach allows you to enhance your portfolio and increase your sales and stream of revenues.
locale.secureImageAlt: Swene - a secure platform to trade bitcoin and ethereum
locale.secureEmphasis: Swene provides its users with a safe, decentralized, and trustless method to store and manage their cryptocurrencies in the form of non-custodial wallets.
locale.secureDescription: To ensure maximum security, the recovery passphrase is encrypted with multiple hashes and RSA encryption. The wallets are decentralized and can only be unilaterally accessed and managed by the users with their inital passphrase. A formal procedure to recover the passphrase is available in case a user loses or discards the passphrase.
locale.uiEmphasis: Swene is designed to give its users an optimized experience by offering them the best features currently available.
locale.uiDescription: Our user experience and user interface are continuously updated and tailored to accomodate and conform to the latest standards, technologies and aesthetics of the web.
locale.uiImageAlt: Swene, an easy-to-use, accessible and optimized user interface
locale.compliantEmphasis: Established in Estonia, Europe, Swene is fully registered and regulated in compliance with worldwide laws.
locale.compliantDescription: Swene's main objective is to provide a regulated environment and a simple, free, complete and downloadable tax report
locale.getStartedDescription: Open an individual or a professional account today to be the first to benefit from exclusive offers, simply enter your email address below to open your account.
locale.getStartedAccountDescription: You're 2 seconds away from opening your account by typing your email address!
locale.alreadyRegistered: This email address is already registered
locale.newsletterTitle: Stay updated by signing up to our newsletter.
locale.newsletterDescription: Receive our latest offers, be the first to hear about us, and get exclusive offers by entering your email address:
